rooms.description: A small foyer designed for a welcoming entry with Vastu-compliant alignment. The entrance is oriented to the north or east to invite positive energy.

features.name: reception area
features.description: The reception area includes a display area for artifacts and plants.

rooms.description: A combined open-plan kitchen and living area, designed with a Brutalist aesthetic featuring exposed concrete walls and robust materials. Vastu principles suggest the space is oriented to the east for activity.

features.name: kitchen
features.description: Fully equipped with modern appliances while maintaining a raw industrial look.

features.name: living area
features.description: Large open space designed for social interaction and relaxation.

rooms.description: A compact servant's quarters located near the back of the property. Adheres to local norms for minimal but functional living space, ensuring privacy and efficiency.

features.name: bathroom
features.description: Basic amenities with proper ventilation and natural light.

rooms.description: A spacious balcony adjoining the open-plan living area and kitchen. Designed to offer a view of the garden and fresh air, enhancing the Brutalist aesthetic with concrete finishes.

features.name: balcony seating
features.description: Built-in seating and railing for relaxation.

openings.name: main entrance
openings.description: Large reinforced concrete door at the north-east facing entrance, providing a secure and inviting entry.

openings.name: servant entrance
openings.description: A secondary entrance for servants located on the south side.

openings.name: balcony access door
openings.description: A windowed opening from the open-plan area to the balcony.
